column2: x-terminal-emulator -T 'Hw-Probe' -e bash -c "hw-probe-installer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Firmware Checker' -e bash -c "firmware-checker; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
x-terminal-emulator -T 'Grub Background Changer' -e bash -c "grub-bg-changer; echo $'\n\nPress any key to close.'; read -srn1"
